desc: Do not buy overpriced hearing aids. You can get high-quality and affordable hearing amplifiers on Hear+Hi. With My Hearing Acuity APP, you can test your hearing and personalize your headset. Not satisfied? We provide you with a 30-day money-back guarantee! Let's begin a free trial!

layout.text: Acuity Duo TWS Assistive Hearing Amplified Earphones
